If by slight chance at the time of purchase it is not available to sell or ship, you will be notified by the next business day and payment will be refunded in full.Hamer - Slammer DCThis is the Hamer Slammer Double Cutaway in great condition! It has some wear on the fretboard, but no dings or scuffs in the finish of body or neck. It has a large 3 3 headstock, wider c shaped neck, with easy access to the top of the 22 fret, fretboard. The placement of the of the electronics are ideal for the strummer, with all volume and tone pots out of the way of the right hand and the 3 way toggle switch situated behind the bridge. Overall, this would make a great guitar for the beginner to intermediate player looking for the growl of a double humbucker double cutaway guitar!
